Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Finicking \Fin"ick*ing\, Finicky \Fin"ick*y\, a. Finical; unduly particular; excessively demanding over minor details. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]
finicky adj : exacting especially about details; "a finicky eater"; "fussy about clothes"; "very particular about how her food was prepared" [syn: {finical}, {fussy}, {particular}]
